Two doses of HepA vaccine are needed for lasting protection. The first dose of HepA vaccine should be given between 12 months and 21 months of age. The second dose should be given 6 to 18 months later. Three doses of the hepatitis B shot are recommended for children.Notes: Shaded boxes indicate the vaccine can be given during shown age range.
